about_the_game:
Magical Girl Programming ✖︎ Auto Battle!

This is an auto-battle shooting game in which Kurumi, a former magical girl office worker, manages a bulletin board to support herself and aims for early retirement with the proceeds.

Bulletin boards are under constant threat. From cracker attacks to troll posts, Kurumi, now a magical girl in cyberspace, will eliminate any and all obstacles to the operation of the bulletin board.

Combat part

In cyberspace, Kurumi transforms into the magical girl she was when she was shining and protects the bulletin board. The game is over when the durability of the bulletin board reaches zero. Also, the messengers who operate according to your programming will be an important part of the game.

Daily life part

Before going into battle, you can act in the real world only once. You will use your physical strength efficiently, sometimes working on the side to earn funds, and sometimes sleeping to conserve your strength. It is also essential to hone your skills as a magical girl in cyberspace.

Protect your bulletin board from cyber attacks, which intensify in proportion to the popularity of your board, and increase your earnings.

The old-fashioned world of the Internet

In the past, bulletin boards were a great place to support Kurumi as a magical girl. Kurumi's heyday has passed, and now those bulletin boards are in disrepair. Protect the bulletin board and become popular again in a screen that reminds you of the Internet and CRTs of the Heisei era.

Simple Programming Function

In order to use the messenger, you need to create a program. The graphical UI operated with the mouse and tutorials are designed so that even programming beginners can learn while playing.
